manifest.name: Trakt Tv
manifest.description: Addon for getting Trakt's public and user lists, recommendations and watch list.

manifest.name: Torrentio
manifest.description: Provides torrent streams from scraped torrent providers. Currently supports YTS(+), EZTV(+), RARBG(+), 1337x(+), ThePirateBay(+), KickassTorrents(+), TorrentGalaxy(+), MagnetDL(+), HorribleSubs(+), NyaaSi(+), TokyoTosho(+), AniDex(+), Rutor(-), Rutracker(-), Comando(-), BluDV(-), Torrent9(-), MejorTorrent(+), Wolfmax4k(+), Cinecalidad(+). To configure providers, RealDebrid/Premiumize/AllDebrid/DebridLink/Offcloud/Put.io support and other settings visit https://torrentio.strem.fun

manifest.name: The Movie Database Addon
manifest.description: Metadata provided by TMDB with pt-BR language.

manifest.name: Jackettio
manifest.description: Stremio addon that resolve streams using Jackett and Debrid. It seamlessly integrates with private trackers.

manifest.name: MediaFusion | ElfHosted
manifest.description: Universal Stremio Add-on for Movies, Series, Live TV & Sports Events. Source: https://github.com/mhdzumair/MediaFusion

manifest.name: KnightCrawler | ElfHosted
manifest.description: KnightCrawler Community: torrent streams provided by popular trackers and DMM hashes
manifest.descriptionHTML:
This is an ElfHosted instance of KnightCrawler, a fork of torrentio.strem.fm, which provides torrent streams from torrent providers' RSS feeds, and DebridMediaManager hashes.

The public instance (knightcrawler.elfhosted.com) is provided free for public use, and rate-limited appropriately for casual individual streaming use (not automation).

ElfHosted is an open-source PaaS built and run by geeks, which self-hosts your favorite streaming apps for you automatically and easily.

Hosted / private KnightCrawler instances with rate-limits appropriate for automation are available.

An internal, un-rate-limited instance is provided free, with all ElfHosted apps, for automation.

What is ElfHosted?

ElfHosted is an open-source platform for "self-hosting" Plex with Real Debrid (using plex_debrid, Riven, or Radarr & Sonarr), and your awesome self-hosted apps, automatically and easily.

We support the Stremio community (Reddit / Discord) by providing free hosting for some of the best Stremio Addons, including those which enable you to:

👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 Share your Real Debrid / Stremio from multiple locations at once (Comet)
🎁 Watch your paid IPTV with Stremio (Xtremio)
📺 Install a Stremio Live TV addon (MediaFusion)
🏈 Watch recorded / live sports with Stremio (MediaFusion)

manifest.name: ThePirateBay+
manifest.description: Search for movies, series and anime from ThePirateBay
The official addon for movie and series catalogs
